title: Guacamole with mango

ingredients.content: 1 fresh red chilli, deseeded if preferred (optional)
1 lime, juiced and zest finely grated
1 mango, flesh only, cut into pieces (2 cm)
1 celery stalk, cut into pieces (5 mm dice)

preparations.content: Place avocado, onion, coriander, chilli (optional), lime zest and juice and salt into mixing bowl and chop <b>20 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add mango and celery and combine <b>12 sec//speed 3<b>.
Serve immediately or cover and place into refrigerator until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: You can replace chilli with chilli oil.
Add arils from half a pomegranate with the mango and celery.
If fresh mango is unavailable, it can be omitted.
